name: Fel Defender
description:
The cooldown of 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Blur - Blur</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Fiery Brand</dynamic>

 is reduced by <dynamic>10 sec</dynamic>.

name: Shattered Restoration
description: The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Felfire Haste
description:
Your movement speed is increased by <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> after casting 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Rush</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Infernal Strike</dynamic>

name: Ravenous Consumption
description:
Your movement speed is increased by <dynamic>15% - 30%</dynamic> after casting 

<spec>Havoc</spec>
<dynamic>Fel Rush</dynamic>

<spec>Vengeance</spec>
<dynamic>Infernal Strike</dynamic>

name: Demonic Parole
description: Enemies that leave your Imprison are snared by 50% for <dynamic>10 sec - 40 sec</dynamic>.

name: Lost in Darkness
description: Increases the duration of Spectral Sight by <dynamic>3 sec - 10 sec</dynamic>.

name: Demon's Touch
description: Demon's Bite increases the damage of other abilities by <dynamic>5% - 16.67%</dynamic>.

name: Dancing with Fate
description: Blade Dance has a <dynamic>5% - 20%</dynamic> chance to apply Essence Break.

name: Serrated Glaive
description: Spending <dynamic>8 - 15</dynamic> Fury buffs the damage of Eye Beam by 8%.

name: Growing Inferno
description: Immolation Aura's damage is increases by an additional <dynamic>5% - 12.5%</dynamic> each time it deals damage.
